Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction

The function AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction sets the obstruction for the specified 3D sample.

void AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction(
  H3DSAMPLE S,
  F32 obstruction
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to control.
obstruction
is the amount that the sample is obstructed. This is a linear value from completely non-obstructed (0.0) to completely obstructed (1.0).

Discussion

Obstructions mean that the direct path of the sound is blocked, but an indirect path is still available - a sound playing from behind a crate, for example.

By default, samples are completely non-obstructed.

On most providers, obstructions are emulated with volume control. On the EAX 2/3/4 providers, however, obstructions are performed in hardware and sound really cool (you can still hear reflections because they bounce around the obstruction).

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C
